about.title: About Me
paragraphs: Hi! My name is Dmitry, and I create websites that work fast, look clean, and bring joy to users. For me, programming isn’t just code — it’s a way to turn an idea into a live, interactive product.
I work with HTML, CSS, SCSS, and JavaScript, and use Gulp and Vite. I often take on projects using WordPress.
I can not only create clean layouts, but also design structure, improve performance, and make the website easy to use.
I take every project seriously: I meet deadlines, write clear code, and pay attention to detail. I'm open to collaboration — feel free to reach out if you're looking for a reliable developer.

cards.title: Aesthetic Space
cards.text: Interior design studio website featuring responsive layout, interactive slider, and animated elements. Includes a pop-up form, cross-browser compatibility, accessibility compliance, and optimized for fast page loading.

cards.title: Survive At All Costs
cards.text: Interactive one-page website for a computer game. Features responsive design, multilingual support, animations, and a slider. Ensures cross-browser compatibility, accessibility, and fast page loading.
